subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Andre Iguodala scored 25 points and Andre Miller added 21 Thursday night, leading the host Philadelphia 76ers to a 101-84 victory over the short-handed Miami Heat.
snippet: Andre Iguodala scored 25 points and Andre Miller added 21 Thursday night, leading the host Philadelphia 76ers to a 101-84 victory over the short-handed Miami Heat.
